Class SpecialStorageCompartment

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.Component
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.Storage
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.SpecialStorageCompartment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SpecialStorageCompartment extends Storage
Represents a special type of storage compartment designed to store goods. This class extends the `Storage` class and provides additional functionality for managing goods within a player's storage system on their player board. The `SpecialStorageCompartment` class stores a collection of `Goods` objects and interacts with the player's board to maintain the total value of goods and update their positions on the grid.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getGoods

      public ArrayList<Goods> getGoods()
      Retrieves the list of goods stored in this special storage compartment. The goods are represented as a collection of objects implementing the Goods interface.
      Overrides:
      getGoods in class Storage
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Goods currently stored in the compartment

    • getValue

      public int getValue(int i)
      Retrieves
      Overrides:
      getValue in class Storage
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the goods item in the storage list
      Returns:
      the integer value associated with the goods at the specified index

    • setGoods

      public void setGoods(ArrayList<Goods> goods)
      Sets the collection of goods for this storage compartment.
      Parameters:
      goods - the list of Goods to set, representing the items to be stored

    • removeGood

      public Goods removeGood(int position)
      Removes a good from the specified position in the list of goods. Updates the total value of the player's board and adjusts the stored goods map accordingly. Sends updates to reflect the current state of the tile.
      Overrides:
      removeGood in class Storage
      Parameters:
      position - the index of the good to remove from the list
      Returns:
      the removed Goods object if the position is valid, or null if the position is out of bounds

    • addGood

      public void addGood(Goods good)
      Adds a new good to the storage compartment. If the compartment is full, an InvalidInput exception is thrown. The total value of goods in the player's board is updated accordingly. The good's location is stored in the player board's storage tracking system, and updates are sent to the corresponding tile.
      Overrides:
      addGood in class Storage
      Parameters:
      good - the good to be added to the storage compartment; must not be null
      Throws:
      InvalidInput - if the storage compartment is already full

    • insert

      public void insert(PlayerBoard playerBoard, int x, int y)
      Inserts this SpecialStorageCompartment into the specified PlayerBoard at the given coordinates. Updates the PlayerBoard's storage and maintains references to goods stored within the compartment.
      Overrides:
      insert in class Storage
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - The player's board where this SpecialStorageCompartment will be placed.
      x - The x-coordinate on the player's board where this storage compartment will be inserted.
      y - The y-coordinate on the player's board where this storage compartment will be inserted.

    • remove

      public void remove(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Removes this storage compartment and its associated goods from the specified player's board. Updates the player's total value and stored goods accordingly and notifies other components of the removal.
      Overrides:
      remove in class Storage
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the player's board from which this storage compartment and its goods are to be removed

    • clone

      public Component clone(PlayerBoard clonedPlayerBoard)
      Creates and returns a deep copy of the current SpecialStorageCompartment instance associated with the given player board. The cloned object is independent of the original instance but maintains its state, including its collection of goods and type.
      Specified by:
      clone in class Component
      Parameters:
      clonedPlayerBoard - the player's board associated with the cloned component
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the current SpecialStorageCompartment instance

    • sendState

      public void sendState()
      Sends the current state of the storage compartment using the associated tile's sendUpdates method. This method triggers an update of the tile and its associated properties, such as the list of goods contained in this storage compartment. It calls the tile's sendUpdates method with the following parameters: - The list of goods in the storage compartment. - Zero for the number of humans, assuming no humans are directly associated with this
      Overrides:
      sendState in class Storage
